alert.note: Alert for Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:20PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Wallowa County through 345 PM PDT... At 320 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Paradise, or 27 miles northeast of Enterprise, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Wallowa County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
